extension.description:
A small Plugin to display a Countdown to a Date in the future.

HOW TO USE:

Use the syntax below in your article or module!
Replace the date with your own! {countdown}8 September 2014 09:51:10{/countdown}


Default Countdown Syntax

<span class="days">00</span>
<span class="timeRefDays">days</span>
<span class="hours">00</span>
<span class="timeRefHours">hours</span>
<span class="minutes">00</span>
<span class="timeRefMinutes">minutes</span>
<span class="seconds">00</span>
<span class="timeRefSeconds">seconds</span>
